name: Puzzle Man - brain challenge
description:
*****

A Fun, Simple Little iPhone Game -- iSmashPhone.com

If you like puzzles, this is a fun relaxing way to pass the time on a commute or during a rainy afternoon -- iPhoneAppCaffe

One of the Best Jigsaw Games Out There -- nineoverten

If you enjoy jigsaws, its light design and effective gameplay will be right up your street -- iphonelife

*****

Puzzle Man is a puzzle simulator.
You'll find a variety of puzzles with different difficulty levels: easy with 24 pieces to advanced ones with 384. A challenge!
You can enjoy high quality images that, for sure, will provide you many hours of entertainment.
Game features:
- rotating pieces, just double tapping on each one.
- Autosave.
- Zoom in / out with multitouch gestures.
- Final image preview.
- Easy and intuitive.

Without doubt, this game can't miss on your Iphone!
